creator: hauser@acm.org
text:
The above-referenced URL claims that catalina.out is always written.

Unfortunately when I use .../Tomcat 4.1/bin/startup.bat out of an <exec> task of
ant, this is not the case. 

How can I force catalina.out to be written all the time since it may contain
error messages I don't see anywhere else?

Bugzilla is NOT a support forum. These types of questions are best asked on 
the tomcat-user mailing list.

There are numerous ways to achieve what you want but something like the ant 
script below should work. If you have any further questions regarding this 
issue please ask them on the tomcat-user mailing list.

<project name="tomcat" default="start" basedir=".">
  <target name="start" description="Start tomcat" >
    <exec executable="C:/jakarta-tomcat-4.0/build/bin/catalina.bat"
          output="C:/jakarta-tomcat-4.0/build/logs/catalina.out" >
      <env key="CATALINA_HOME" value="C:/jakarta-tomcat-4.0/build" />
      <arg value="run" />
    </exec>
  </target>
</project>
